Class AdvancementManager

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.advancements.AdvancementManager
public class AdvancementManager extends Object
Used to manage all the registered AdvancementTab.

Use createTab(String, AdvancementRoot) to create a tab with the appropriate AdvancementRoot.

    • createTab

      @NotNull public @NotNull AdvancementTab createTab(@NotNull @NotNull String rootIdentifier, @NotNull @NotNull AdvancementRoot root)
      Creates a new AdvancementTab with a single AdvancementRoot.
      Parameters:
      rootIdentifier - the root identifier
      root - the root advancement
      Returns:
      the newly created AdvancementTab
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if a tab with the identifier rootIdentifier already exists

    • getTab

      @Nullable public @Nullable AdvancementTab getTab(@NotNull @NotNull String rootIdentifier)
      Gets an advancement tab by its root identifier.
      Parameters:
      rootIdentifier - the root identifier of the tab
      Returns:
      the AdvancementTab associated with the identifier, null if not any

    • getTabs

      @NotNull public @NotNull Collection<AdvancementTab> getTabs()
      Gets all the created AdvancementTab.
      Returns:
      the collection containing all created AdvancementTab
